titleStmt.title: A muzzle for Cerberus, and his three vvhelps Mercurius Elencticus, Bellicus, and Melancholicus: barking against patriots & martialists, in the present reign of their unwormed rage. With criticall reflections, on the revolt of Inchequin in Ireland. / By Mercurio-Mastix Hibernicus. ...
titleStmt.author: Mercurio-Mastix Hibernicus.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for R. Smithurst, and are to be sold neer Hosier-Lane,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
